name: Walker
overview: A scrolling shooter published in 64'er 1994/02. Jump'n'run and graphics freaks will laugh: this game is characterized not only by insane speed, but also by parallax scrolling over ten different levels! The "Walker" can be moved forwards or backwards, he can jump and activate his laser cannon by firing it. If you press the joystick to the right, the action takes off: The Walker races across the screen! On the way he encounters boulders. Insects and giant banana leaves. You have to learn to shoot down these obstacles without thinking twice (or at least dodge them) - every touch, no matter how small, costs the walker 1000 points of his valuable energy supply (coupled with the score display at the top left). sinks you. If the number is below 0, the message "Game over" appears and the number of points/energy achieved up to that point. Parallax scrolling begins as soon as the walker crosses the center of the screen. If you want to change this position, you must enter before you start: POKE 2924.32 ♦ X • 8; PCatE 6102.32: RUN X must not be greater than "13" (only integer numbers are permitted, i.e. without decimal places. 0 = left, 13 « right). For whom the game speed is too high. he can dim them a little with the slow-motion switch on the corresponding joystick!
